features: Easy to Use Glitter Pens: Squeezable tubes with screw caps for mess-free crafting. Simply open and apply glitter glue to your projects. Allow time to dry for a sparkling finish. Perfect for enhancing artwork, decorations, and DIY crafts.

Ideal for Gifting & Back to School: Perfect addition to craft kits for kids or adults. Great for Christmas crafts, birthdays, and school supplies. These glitter glue pens inspire creativity and are a fun, practical gift for all ages.

Versatile Crafting Supplies: Great for Christmas card making, kids’ crafts, decorating models, and more. These glitter pens work on various surfaces, adding a dazzling touch to personalized cards, drawings, or scrapbooks. Perfect for creative play.

Complete Glitter Pen Set: Includes 10 glitter glue pens in vibrant colors, perfect for crafting, school projects, and scrapbooking. These soft, squeezable tubes add shimmer and creativity to cards, drawings, and decorations. Suitable for kids 3+ and adults.

High-Quality & Safe Materials: Non-toxic, water-based glue that's odorless and washable. Easy to clean off skin and clothes. Durable squeezable tubes ensure mess-free application for crafting, schoolwork, and art projects at home or in the classroom.
description: Product Description Vibrant Glitter Pen Set Unlock your creativity with our dazzling set of 10 Glitter Pens, each filled with vibrant swirl glue. This package features ONE pack containing ten sparkling glitter pens in a rainbow of colors, perfect for any artistic endeavor. Whether you're a student, teacher, or craft enthusiast, these pens are a must-have. Perfectly designed for children aged 3 and up, they make an excellent addition to school supplies, sparking creativity and fun. Imagine the endless possibilities of adding a glittering touch to your projects – from school assignments to homemade cards. These glitter pens will make every creation shine! Ideal Size for Crafting Each glitter pen measures a convenient 10cm in length and 1cm in diameter, ensuring they are easy to handle for both little hands and adults. Their compact size makes them perfect for storage in pencil cases, art boxes, and crafting kits, so you can take them anywhere. The ergonomic design ensures comfortable use, even during extended crafting sessions. Imagine the joy of effortlessly adding intricate details to your artwork or craft projects with these perfectly sized pens. They are not just tools; they are the key to unlocking your artistic potential! Safe and High-Quality Materials Craft with confidence knowing our Glitter Glue Sticks are made from premium, non-toxic plastic. The glue-based glitter is odorless, water-based, and easy to wash off skin and clothing, making cleanup a breeze. These pens are designed with safety in mind, providing peace of mind for parents and fun for kids. Imagine a crafting session where you don't have to worry about stains or harmful chemicals – just pure, creative joy. These glitter pens are the perfect blend of safety and quality, ensuring every project is both beautiful and safe. Brilliantly Shiny Glitter Transform your art with our brilliantly shiny glitter tubes, available in a spectrum of bright, eye-catching colors. The soft, flexible gel tubes allow for easy squeezing, enabling precise application to bring your designs to life. These high-quality glitter pens can ignite a child's passion for painting and drawing, making every artwork sparkle with creativity. Imagine the excitement and pride in creating masterpieces that glitter and shine. Let your imagination run wild and add a touch of magic to your projects with these exceptional glitter pens. Versatile and Easy to Use Our squeezable glitter tubes are designed for versatility, making them perfect for a wide range of art and craft projects. Whether it's school model making, decorating, scrap-booking, or card making, these mess-free glitter pens are your ideal companion. Simply open the cap and let your creativity flow without any hassle. They work wonderfully on various surfaces and can be used at home, in the classroom, or the office. Picture the delight of using these vibrant pens to add a beautiful, refined touch to any project. They also make an ideal gift for back-to-school season, sparking creativity in everyone who uses them. Quantity 10Pcs Size 10cm x 1cm (LxDia) Pen Material PVC Ink Material Glue-Based Glitter Special Features Squeezable, Flexible & Easy to Use Non-toxic Yes Suitable For All Arts and Crafts Projects Washable Yes
